title: Bug 116829: Label height doesn't change with label font modification.
description: Description: Label font size doesn't change right away when it is modified.
OB: The label height remains the same after the label font size is modified in the user interface.
EB: After modifying the label font size in the user interface, the label height should adjust accordingly.
SR: To reproduce the issue:1. Add a label.2. Edit the font size of the label to "18 points".
